events.name: New Orleans Pelicans at Indiana Pacers

headlines.description: — Pascal Siakam scored 22 points and Tyrese Haliburton added 21 points and 10 assists to lead the Indiana Pacers past the struggling New Orleans Pelicans 119-104 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Siakam scores 22, Haliburton has 21 points and 10 assists to lead Pacers past Pelicans 119-104

headlines.description: — Jayson Tatum had 28 points and 12 rebounds and the Boston Celtics cruised to a 112-98 victory over the Washington Wizards on Sunday night.

events.name: New York Knicks at Orlando Magic

headlines.description: — Jalen Brunson scored 31 points, Karl-Anthony Towns added 22 points and 22 rebounds and the New York Knicks beat the Orlando Magic 100-91 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jalen Brunson and Karl-Anthony Towns lead Knicks over Magic 100-91

events.name: Minnesota Timberwolves at San Antonio Spurs

headlines.description: — Anthony Edwards had 26 points and the Minnesota Timberwolves rolled past the San Antonio Spurs 106-92 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Edwards scores 26 points as Timberwolves beat Spurs 106-92

events.name: Portland Trail Blazers at Phoenix Suns

headlines.description: — Devin Booker scored 28 points and the Phoenix Suns beat Portland 116-109 on Sunday night to extend the Trail Blazers' losing streak to six games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Suns send Trail Blazers to 6th straight loss with 116-109 victory

events.name: Dallas Mavericks at Golden State Warriors

headlines.description: — Luka Doncic had his 80th career triple-double with a season-high 45 points along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds, and the Dallas Mavericks beat Klay Thompson's former Golden State Warriors 143-133 on Sunday night in a second visit to Chase Center in...
headlines.shortLinkText: Luka Doncic has triple-double with season-best 45 points in Mavs' 143-133 win over Warriors

events.name: Memphis Grizzlies at Los Angeles Lakers

headlines.description: — Anthony Davis had 40 points and 16 rebounds, LeBron James added 18 points in his return and the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Memphis Grizzlies 116-110 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Anthony Davis scores 40 points, LeBron James has 18 in return to help Lakers beat Grizzlies, 116-110

highlights.headline: 'Welcome back, LBJ!' LeBron follows massive dunk with chase-down block
highlights.description: In his first game in nine days, LeBron James flies in for a hammer dunk that leads to a chase-down block at the other end of the court.
